entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 7:30 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -20.1°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 22 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
